S2.name: Spirit:
S2.text: The heart of our great kingdom! I wouldn’t want to be anywhere else.

S3.name: Spirit:
S3.text: My partner and I first met at this fountain! I wished to marry them and now here we are!!

M1.name: Spirit:
M1.text: II wish for my crops to grow again...

M2.name: Spirit:
M2.text: I wish for my child to recover from his illness… please…

M3.name: Spirit:
M3.text: I met my partner at this fountain…. and now they’re gone.

M3.name: Spirit:
M3.text: I came here to remember them but those happy memories have all faded now.

neutral.name: Spirit:
neutral.text: I’ve never seen waters as clear as this!
